A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Terrible movie.  Half way through I thought to myself\, this movie sucks. Why all the jokes? Mary Poppins Princess Leia? Luke Slywalker wuss? Bad acting. Milk from a who knows what? 

Plot holes you could drive a truck through (Vice Admiral Holdo\, just tell Poe the escape pods are cloaked - save you 30 minutes of movie in one sentence) and why even have Snoke as a character? Worthless...

So was this movie.
